criteria: Understanding of Place Value: Demonstrates the ability to break down numbers 11-19 into tens and ones.
Representation: Effectively uses drawings or equations to represent the composition or decomposition.
Explanation: Clearly explains the understanding that numbers 11-19 are composed of ten ones and some further ones.
descriptions: Student is unable to decompose numbers 11-19 into tens and ones or provide any representation.
Student attempts to decompose numbers but struggles with the concept of place value. Representation is unclear or incorrect.
Student can decompose some numbers into tens and ones but makes frequent errors or requires significant prompting. Representation is partially accurate.
Student can accurately decompose numbers 11-19 into tens and ones using objects or drawings. Representation is generally clear but may have minor inaccuracies.
Student consistently and accurately decomposes numbers 11-19 into tens and ones. Representation is clear, accurate, and demonstrates a solid understanding of place value.

Student demonstrates a deep understanding of place value by accurately and efficiently decomposing numbers 11-19 into tens and ones. Representation is exceptionally clear, detailed, and may include multiple methods of decomposition.
No attempt to use drawings or equations to represent composition or decomposition.
Drawings or equations are used, but are inaccurate or do not relate to the numbers being decomposed.
Drawings or equations are partially accurate but contain errors or are difficult to interpret.
Drawings or equations are mostly accurate and represent the composition or decomposition of numbers 11-19, but some minor improvements could be made.
Drawings or equations are accurate, clear, and effectively represent the composition or decomposition of numbers 11-19.
Drawings or equations are exceptionally clear, creative, and insightful, demonstrating a sophisticated understanding of how numbers 11-19 are composed of tens and ones.
Unable to explain the composition of numbers 11-19 or demonstrate any understanding of the concept.
Attempts to explain the composition but provides inaccurate or unclear information.
Explanation is partially accurate but lacks clarity or detail. Demonstrates a limited understanding of the concept.
Explanation is generally accurate and conveys the basic understanding that numbers 11-19 are composed of ten ones and some further ones.
Explanation is clear, accurate, and provides a comprehensive understanding of the composition of numbers 11-19.
Explanation is exceptionally clear, insightful, and demonstrates a deep understanding of the relationship between tens and ones in numbers 11-19. Can explain the concept in multiple ways.
